name: Tipping Point v2
description:
FREE TO DOWNLOAD ON THE APP STORE!

App Store Download Link

Inspired by a larger game I'm currently making called SphereTheory - I game I prototyped on a train journey from Manchester to Edinburgh, I have added a simple score system and added chickens… because, what is a game without chickens?

It'll hopefully find its way to iOS and Android without too many teething problems, just getting the controls right and then I can look in to creating different environments which will influence gameplay such as arctic (friction) and volcanic (eruptions or earthquakes).
